bedroom.Name: BRIGHTON SOFA BED IN A CHOICE OF FOUR COLOURS
bedroom.Body:
The Brighton sofa bed makes an everyday item a little bit more extra. Upholstered with a soft and cosy velvet this sofa bed will look super sophisticated in any home. Coming in a shimmering grey the Brighton has considered all the details too, even with detail on the legs which are chrome silver so it will enhance the materials look. The Brighton will be a relaxing and comfortable piece of furniture whilst also looking good amongst all interior. The Brighton is an effortless day to night option which is easy to use for either yourself or your guests.

Assembled Dimensions W 1800 mm X H 760 mm X D 850 mm

bedroom.Name: Otto Trio Bunk Beds for sale, Pine/Navy/White, three sleeper
bedroom.Body:
Great for guest rooms, sleepovers and pyjama parties, the Otto Trio Bunk Bed is a heavy duty triple sleeper that offers superb versatility. This single and small double bed combination can be configured as a stacked set to act as a bunk bed or can be separated into a single and a small double (4’) to suit your requirements. Finished in a classic Solid Off White Colour, Pine or Navy, the Otto Bed system is ideal for providing all the sleeping space you need for a busy family.

Finished in a classic Solid Off White Colour, Pine or Navy, the Leo Bed system is ideal for providing all the sleeping space you need for a busy family.

beds.Body:

Coming in a shimmering grey the Brighton has considered all the details too, even with detail on the legs which are chrome silver so it will enhance the materials look. The Brighton is an effortless day to night option which is easy to use for either yourself or your guests.

beds.Name: Otto Trio Bunk Beds for sale, Pine/Navy/White, three sleeper
beds.Body:
Great for guest rooms, sleepovers and pyjama parties, the Otto Trio Bunk Bed is a heavy duty triple sleeper that offers superb versatility. This single and small double bed combination can be configured as a stacked set to act as a bunk bed or can be separated into a single and a small double (4’) to suit your requirements. Finished in a classic Solid Off White Colour, Pine or Navy, the Otto Bed system is ideal for providing all the sleeping space you need for a busy family.

dining-room.Body:

Comprising of beautiful, leaning lines and simple shelving structures, the versatile pieces in the Tiva range can be joined together to form larger media or storage unit. Finished in a stunning white and comprising of 4 shelves, this is ideal for creating simple shelving or display areas around the home whatever your style!

dining-room.Name: PORTLAND KITCHEN ISLAND
dining-room.Body:
Need additional, practical kitchen space but not the price tag? We're pleased to offer the Portland Kitchen Island, an affordable and portable island unit that provides all the extra space and style your family require. With handy hooks and a towel holder to one end, the carcass of the island comprises of a spacious double cupboard, two drawers and a practical solid wood worktop. An excellent way to add some stylish storage to your kitchen without spending a small fortune, the Portland features silver accessories and a stunning contemporary black finish, also available in grey or white

Material Wood
Colour Black/Grey or White
Style Traditional
Assembly Type Self Assembly
Number of Doors 2
Number of Shelves 1
Table Type Fixed Top
Family Portland Black, Grey or White
Assembled Dimensions W 950 mm X H 910 mm X D 460 mm

dining-room.Body:
For a truly futuristic look, the Matrix Dining Table features a white high-gloss stand and surround in place of traditional legs, finished with a sleek black glass top that is inset with blue LEDs. Ideal for minimalists who want clean lines with a bit of a twist, this collection gives a stunning infinity effect that has left nothing to chance, with the LEDs being operated using batteries and leaving no unsightly wires that might spoil the sleek finish of this very special design.

Finished in a stunning white and comprising of 4 shelves, this is ideal for creating simple shelving or display areas around the home whatever your style!

W 386 mm X H 1754 mm X D 386 mm

lounge.Name: Cotswold Bookcase Grey
lounge.Body:
Dimensions:
W93 x H195 x D41.5 cm

The Cotswold Bookcase offers a refined solution to a versatile mix of open and hidden storage. Comprised of a combination of nook shelves, drawers and basket space, its stylish silver handles give a luxurious look while the basket storage gives an instant cottage feel. Details like the contrasting chamfered edge top and grey/cream and Oak finish give this classy piece of furniture an original style

Features:

  • 6 storage openings, 2 drawers and 2 baskets
  • Grey painted finish with oak finish top
  • Country design
  • Stylish silver handles
  • Assembly required

lounge.Name: BRIGHTON SOFA BED IN A CHOICE OF FOUR COLOURS
lounge.Body:
The Brighton sofa bed makes an everyday item a little bit more extra. Upholstered with a soft and cosy velvet this sofa bed will look super sophisticated in any home. Coming in a shimmering grey the Brighton has considered all the details too, even with detail on the legs which are chrome silver so it will enhance the materials look. The Brighton will be a relaxing and comfortable piece of furniture whilst also looking good amongst all interior. The Brighton is an effortless day to night option which is easy to use for either yourself or your guests.

Assembled Dimensions W 1800 mm X H 760 mm X D 850 mm

lounge.Name: York 2 Seater Sofa Mink
lounge.Body:
Beautifully designed to offer comfort, style and value; the York fabric 2 seater sofa will be a valuable addition to any contemporary living space.

The York displays elegant lines with a formal buttoned back, piped detailing and soft, durable chenille style fabric upholstery.

It is presented in two modern colours, mink or slate grey; allowing you to select the one that best suits your existing decor.

Complementing tapered wooden legs provide the perfect finishing touch to this stylish piece of living room furniture.

The sofa boasts a robust wooden frame construction with lightly padded back and arm rests and high density foam filled seat pads.

Assembled Dimensions
W 1490 mm X H 740 mm X D 830 mm

Bringing both colour and playfulness into any retro-styled room, this tub chair has a matching sofa, offers comfort in the plump seat and a contemporary design.
